mapper.sql: SELECT mwht.id , mwht.wallet_id , mwht.operation_type , mwht.amount , mwht.desc , mwht.create_by , mwht.create_date , mwht.last_modified_by , mwht.last_modified_date FROM mdl_wallet_history mwht
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mdl_wallet_history( wallet_id, operation_type , amount , `desc` , create_by ) VALUES( #{walletId}, #{operationType}, #{amount}, #{desc}, #{createBy} )
mapper.select: where mwht.wallet_id = #{walletId} order by mwht.create_date desc
